title: Eladrin
entryLore: Elves of the Feywild, eladrin resonate with the emotions of the seasons, shifting their appearance and abilities to match the natural cycles of their home plane. This lineage possesses a mercurial nature, tied deeply to the mercurial magic of the Feywild.

traits.name: Fey Step
traits.description: As a [[bonus_action|Bonus Action]], you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your [[proficiency_bonus|Proficiency Bonus]], regaining all uses on a [[long_rest|Long Rest]]. From level 3, the teleportation gain additional effects based on your chosen season (Autumn, Winter, Spring, or Summer).

traits.name: Trance (Eladrin)
traits.description: Whenever you finish a [[long_rest|Long Rest]] using your Trance, you can change your season. You also gain [[proficiency|proficiency]] in two weapons or tools of your choice until your next long rest, as you draw on the shared memories of your elven ancestry.
